unnormalised: Film Festivals: Lights, Camera, AND Biryani!
normalised: Film Festivals: Lights, Camera, AND Biryani!

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Festival season is kicking off, and itâ€™s not just Diwali! Film fests are popping up all over, from the IFFI in Goa to smaller, independent ones in Pune.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Festival season is kicking off, and it's not just Diwali! Film fests are popping up all over, from the I F F I in Goa to smaller, independent ones in Pune.

unnormalised: Spotted last week: Director Karan Johar at the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival looking dapper as ever! Word is, his new movie is being shopped around for international distribution. Fingers crossed!
normalised: Spotted last week: Director Karan Johar at the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival looking dapper as ever! Word is, his new movie is being shopped around for international distribution. Fingers crossed!

unnormalised: But it's not all red carpets and fancy premieres. Many festivals are focusing on regional cinema this year, showcasing powerful stories from all corners of India.
normalised: But it's not all red carpets and fancy premieres. Many festivals are focusing on regional cinema this year, showcasing powerful stories from all corners of India.

unnormalised: Plus, let's be honest, the after-parties are half the fun. We hear whispers of amazing Onam Sadhya feasts at the Kerala film festivals. And who can resist the delicious Biryani served at Hyderabad film functions after a late-night screening?
normalised: Plus, let's be honest, the after-parties are half the fun. We hear whispers of amazing Onam Sadhya feasts at the Kerala film festivals. And who can resist the delicious Biryani served at Hyderabad film functions after a late-night screening?

unnormalised: These festivals are a great place for filmmakers to connect, and regular folks to see some seriously awesome flicks you won't find anywhere else. So, check out your local listings and get ready for some cinematic magic. Maybe even snag a selfie with your favorite star (if you're lucky!).
